<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Lunge](/Feats.aspx?ID=369) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=71" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 146 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Requirements**
You are wielding a melee weapon.

</column>

---

Extending your body to its limits, you attack an enemy that would normally be beyond your reach. Make a Strike with a melee weapon, increasing your reach by 5 feet for that Strike. If the weapon has the [disarm](/Traits.aspx?ID=175), [shove](/Traits.aspx?ID=193), or [trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196) trait, you can use the corresponding action instead of a Strike.

<title level="2">Lunge leads to...</title>
[Lunging Stance](/Feats.aspx?ID=411)
